articles.title: Laser eye surgery patients reveal what REALLY happens when procedure goes wrong - Daily Mail
articles.description: Laser eye surgery, also known as LASIK, is a vision corrective procedure which uses a laser to reshape the inner cornea. Roughly half a million Americans have the surgery every year.
articles.content:
